mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and silver on white) announcing Twangfest featuring Gurf Morlix and the Real Killers, Slobberbone, James Intveld, Calvin Cooke and the Sacred Steel Ensemble, Billy Joe Shaver, Kev Russell's Junker, Mike Ireland and Holler, Marti Brom, Marlee McLeod Band, Tommy Womack, Lonesome Pines, Thad Cockrell and the Starlite Country Band, Kelly Hogan, Dallas Wayne, One Riot One Ranger, Lonesome Bob, the Sovines, the Morells, the Damnations, and Christy McWilson at the Duck Room in St. Louis, Missouri on June 5-8.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
